      • suffixMatchChunks

        public static boolean suffixMatchChunks(byte[] terminator,
                        ByteBuffer currentBuff,
                        ByteBuffer... prev)
        byte-compare of suffixes
        Parameters:
        terminator - the token used to terminate presumably unbounded growth of a list of buffers
        currentBuff - current ByteBuffer which does not necessarily require a list to perform suffix checks.
        prev - a linked list which holds previous chunks
        Returns:
        whether the suffix composes the tail bytes of current and prev buffers.
